value.label: Location or business name on quote differs from fact finder or website

value.label: Overall risk falls outside carrier appetite

value.label: Percentage of subcontractor receipts falls outside carrier appetite

value.label: Quoted coverage is not equal to or greater than current policy

value.label: Quote UW questions inaccurately answered in carrier website

value.label: Rating information is inaccurate (payroll, revenue, square ft, etc.)
